alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Essex, northeastern Suffolk and east central Middlesex Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saugus, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Minor Flooding SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Lynn, Somerville, Malden, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Beverly, Woburn, Melrose, Saugus, Danvers, Wakefield, Reading, Belmont, Burlington and Stoneham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern and northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex
